title: Tacos del Rancho
ingredients: 1 bag of Del Rancho® Chicharrón® (pork rinds)
Spread the tortillas with the avocado sauce, add the chicharrones, crown with the onions and serve.
Mix all ingredients in a bowl and let macerate for 30 minutes.
Place all ingredients in a food processor and process until smooth.
instructions: Step 1: Join all the ingredients in the tortilla and enjoy.
